H0.text: The moons of Jupiter were discovered as a result of the first telescopes, invented hundreds of years ago.

H1.text: The bacteria that causes disease was discovered as a result of the first telescopes, which were invented hundreds of years ago.

H2.text: The deepâ€‘sea trenches in the ocean were discovered as a result of the invention of the first telescopes, which were invented hundreds of years ago.

H3.text: The parts of a plant that perform photosynthesis were discovered as a result of the invention of the first telescopes, which were invented hundreds of years ago.

A4.text: The invention of the telescope allowed astronomers to discover the moons in 1610.

A5.text: Galileo's discovery proved the importance of the telescope as a tool for astronomers by showing that there were objects in space to be discovered that until then had remained unseen by the naked eye.
